insert into lodging_information (lod_no, lod_name, lod_address, lod_check_in, lod_check_out, lod_intro, category_no, lod_grade_no, lod_refund, lod_sales) values (#{no}, #{name}, #{address}, #{checkIn}, #{checkOut}, #{intro}, #{categoryNo}, #{GradeNo}, #{lodRefund}, #{lodSales})
mapper.update: update lodging_information set lod_name = #{name}, lod_address = #{address}, lod_check_in = #{checkIn}, lod_check_out = #{checkOut}, lod_intro = #{intro}, lod_refund = #{lodRefund} where lod_no = #{no}
mapper.select: select lod_no as no, lod_name as name, lod_address as address, lod_check_in as checkIn, lod_check_out as checkOut, lod_intro as intro, category_no as categoryNo, lod_grade_no as GradeNo, lod_Refund as lodRefund, lod_sales as lodSales from lodging_information
